item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Njengoba mina kushintshelwe kumawindi 10 nge-WSL Ngibone ukuthi ngizokwenza uhlu lwesoftware ebengizolusebenzisa ukusondeza amawindi eduze kokuhamba komsebenzi kwami ​​okujwayelekile kwe-linux. Masikucacise ukuthi iWindows UI iyabamba, inamathele kufayela le-90s futhi yonke into kufanele ichofozwe futhi ihudulwe ngesikhombi sakho segundane. Angazi noma ngabe i- isiko thing (windows devs kumele athande igundane kakhulu), noma i- inani labantu okubhekiswe kulo ("chofoza kuleyo nto!" kulula ukuyichaza), noma ngenxa ye- ukuphepha umkhuba omuhle kakhulu (uma sinika umsebenzisi ukulawula okuningi, i-malware izokusebenzisa kabi) noma i- I-Windows Shell ukwenziwa inqwaba yezikweletu zobuchwepheshe ezenza kube nzima ukwengeza ukusebenza kwabasebenzisi abaphambili. Iqiniso ukuthi izinto ezilula ku-Linux zidinga izixazululo eziqinisekisiwe ku-Windows.

Ama-Desktops abonakalayo

Ku-linux yonke imenenja yamawindows inendlela ethile yedeskithophu ebonakalayo, amawindi akhiwe ngokwamakhompiyutha abonakalayo muva nje nge-W10. Into ukuthi ngesikhathi sokubhala ungajikeleza kuphela ngakwesokunxele nangakwesokudla ngama-hotkey, futhi awekho ama-hotkey okuya kudeskithophu X. Kukhona lokhu vd umtapo wolwazi kepha angitholanga isoftware eyisebenzisayo, esikhundleni se-AHK kuphela[1] imibhalo enokusetshenziswa okungalungile okufana ne- "loop size sibe ku-VD efanele".

Ukushoda kwezinqamuleli ezifanele zama-desktop desktops angenze ngaphoqeleka ukusebenzisa i-3rd party software, okukhona okuningi, engikukhethile i-dexpot njengoba lenza zonke izinto engizodinga nokuningi (ngingajabula nge-justgo to X futhimove window to X izinqamuleli). Inkinga kuphela ukuthi i-dexpot ayikwazi ukubopha okhiye asebevele baboshwe ... ngandlela-thile i-AHK iyakwazi ukubhala ngaphezulu okhiye abasetshenziswa ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza, kanti i-dexpot ayenzi, ngicabanga ukuthi kungenxa yokuthi incike kwi-windows API ehlukile (noma [dll]). Ukusebenzela ukubuyisela izinqamuleli engikufunayo (isb.Win+1 ) ngesinqamuleli samahhala esingasethwa ku-dexpot (isb.Win+Shift+F1)

Imephu yekhibhodi

UPowertoys ivumela ukwenza amamephu okhiye, nezinqamuleli, ukuze ngikwazi ukwenza imephu ku-CapsLock-> LeftControl naku-RightControl-> LeftControl. Futhi izinqamuleli ezifanaWin+hjkl imicibisholo. Kubi kakhuluWin+l isinqamuleli esizenzakalelayo samawindi sokukhiya isikrini futhi asikwazi ukuphinda simiswe kabusha ... ukhiye wokubhalisa ukhipha izinqamuleli bese ulungisa lokhu ... uze uvuselele amawindi ... ngakho-ke kufanele usebenzise ukulungiswa ebhuthini ngalinye!

Isiqalisi

Isiqalisi sezinhlelo zokusebenza esihlinzekwe ngama-powertoys sisebenza kakhulu, asisebenzisi imemori ethe xaxa kune-KRunner futhi siyashesha futhi siyaphendula. Isikhalazo kuphela ukuthi ngezikhathi ezithile ilahla ukugxila, kepha lokhu kungenzeka kube yinkinga yokulawulwa kweWindows (njengokulawula okuhlanekezelwe) ukuthi iliphi iwindi okufanele ligxilwe nganoma yisiphi isikhathi.

Ukuthayipha

Ngishintshe kusuka ekushintsheni ngaya ku-KDE ku-Linux, ngakho-ke bengingeyona kangako isithandi samawindi asethayili. IPowertoys ineFancyZones okungukuthuthuka okuncane kunamawindows ayisisekelo Snaps anikezwa iwindi, njengoba ikunikeza izikhala futhi izakhiwo. Noma kunjalo isantula into ebaluleke kakhulu eyenza ukuthayela kube wusizo, okungukuthi imithetho ukufaka isicelo kumawindi afanayo, kepha lokhu kuzodinga nokusekelwa kwama-desktops abonakalayo ... futhi sesivele sishilo isimo sabo samanje. Ku-Comparison KWin ikuvumela ukufanisa windows nezincazelo eziyinkimbinkimbi kakhulu. I-FancyZones isebenza ngokuzungeza ukukhishwa kwemithetho ngokulondoloza izikhundla zewindows ngezikhathi zonke, kepha angizange ngiphenye ukuthi lokhu kusebenza kanjani kahle ngamadeskithophu ahlukahlukene.

Ukuhudula amawindi

IWindows ingahudulwa kuphela kusuka kubha yamatayitela, nokungeziwe Umbuso idinga ukusetshenziselwa ukuyihambisa ngenhlanganisela yesinqamuleli.

Ukuqapha kwesistimu

Nge-KDE unamawijethi we-plasma wokubonisa imininingwane yohlelo, noma amawijethi we-plasma athambekele ekusebenziseni inkumbulo eningi ngakho angiwasebenzisanga kangako. NgeWindows ayikho insiza eyakhelwe ngaphakathi yalokhu, ngemuva kokuzama izinsiza ezimbalwa engizinze kuzo Ukuqapha Kwethrafikhi enikeza inethiwekhi, i-cpu, inkumbulo, futhi muva nje kungezwe i-GPU nesikhathi. Umphumela ungunxande omuhle wephrofayili ephansi okhonjiswe ngaphakathi kwebha yomsebenzi:

Iphuzu lebhonasi leWindows ukuthi i-UPS yami iyabonwa futhi iyakhonjiswa endaweni yetreyi, ngakho-ke ayidingi ukumiswa okwengeziwe, kanti ku-linux I-NUT bangu izinkinga zabashayeli.

Izinsiza Zesistimu

Abaningi abathandanga i-systemd lapho ingena ku-linux kernel..NgeWindows ngivele ngaqala ukuyilahla..Windows Services akuyona into eqondiswe kubasebenzisi njenge-systemd. IWindows ine Isihleli Somsebenzi ukubhekana nezinto ezibukekaone-shotamayunithi, kepha futhi isikhombimsebenzisi sayo (noma ukuntuleka kwawo) siyesabeka. Sinenhlanhla asidingi amademoni angokwezifiso kumawindi, ngoba iningi lezinhlelo zokusebenza zewindows esizisebenzisayo kuthiwa zilungile run ekuqaleni uhlobo lomqondo, futhi awudingi ukucushwa okuthuthuke kakhulu. Eqinisweni, ngaphandle kukadoti wamathuluzi ( ukububula ukwenza amawindi asebenze njengemvelo yesimanje, bese kuthi ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zomdabu ezisetshenziswayo yisiphequluli ( firefox ) ngoba ukusheshisa kwe-GPU yesiphequluli kubi ngaphakathi kwe-WSL (kahle ngisho naku-linux yendabuko ...) nesidlali sevidiyo ( mpv ) .. nemidlalo kunjalo ...

Amaphakheji

Angithandi ushokoledi njengoba kudinga amalungelo omlawuli, ngihlala ngibheka kuqala amaphakethe we-scoop njengoba lawo efakwe kufolda yomsebenzisi, elula kakhulu futhi engaguquguquki, futhi enza izipele zibe lula.

I-WSL / g

Ngikhuthazelwe ukushintshela kumawindi kusuka kwakamuva WSLg buyekeza. Okudinga ukuthi abashayeli be-mesa bahlanganiswe ned3d12 ukusekela emuva kweopengl . IWindows inikeza ungqimba lomphakathi lokubuka kuqala umphakathi, kepha ngakhetha i- i-arch linux ngoba bekuvele kukhona iphakethe le-AUR le- mesa nge-d3d12 . Njengoba i-WSL okwamanje ingasekeli uhlelo, ngagcina ngisebenzisa umphathi ukuphatha izinsizakalo ezimbalwa. Ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umphathi uyasebenza kunesheke kuphrofayela ye-Shell yefayela lokukhiya okufanele lakhiwe kulotmpfs uma umphathi eseqalisiwe phambilini.

I-WSL isekela kuphelaext4 file system, ukusebenzisa amanye amasistimu wefayela, kufanele ukhweze ukwahlukanisa (noma idiski) ngaphakathi ngaphakathi kwe-WSL VM. Kodwa-ke kufanele zifakwe ngesandla njengomlawulikusuka kumawindi. Ukuzenzekelayo lokhu singasebenzisa isihleli somsebenzi esivumela ukweqa ukwaziswa kwe-UAC ngokwenza imisebenzi nge-priviledge ephezulu kakhulu . Singasebenza i-wsl--mount umyalo wokufaka amadiski / ukwahlukaniswa kwethu okuthandayo bese ugijima ukufaka isistimu yefayela kusuka ngaphakathi kwe-linux. Ngoba eyami/home/ uhlala endaweni egibelebtrfs uhlelo lwefayela kufanele ngilukhuphule ngokuzenzakalela, ngakho-ke sisebenzisa/etc/fstab ukumaka ukwahlukanisa kwethu (ngeLABEL ) ukuze/home . Ngoba sisebenzisa i-nix ngenix-env sidinga ukubopha ukukhweza isitolo sethu se-nix ku-/nix kukho konke ukuqala kwe-wsl, futhi ngoba/tmp ayikhotmpfs kufanele sakhe intaba yokumbondelana enyukayotmpfs ngaphezulu kokukhona/tmp isiqondisi, ukugcina amafayela abalulekile, ikakhulukazi amafayela we-X11, adingekayo ukukhuluma neseva ye-X.

Lezi zintaba zisebenza ngombhalo, okufanele usebenze ngemuva sifake idiski ngaphakathi kwe-linux. Sidinga umsebenzi osebenza ngemuva kokuthi umsebenzi wokuphothula usuphothuliwe, futhi ngenxa yokuthi i-WSL isebenzisa ama-VM ahlukile kubasebenzisi abahlukahlukene bewindows iskripthi kufanele senziwe HHAYI ngamalungelo aphakeme (uma kungenjalo sizokhwela ku-Administrator VM).

Ukuqinisekisa ukuthi i-WSLg iyasebenza, kufanele siqiniseke ukuthi i-XDG UKUGIJIMA I-DIR isethiwe, ngoba yehlukile futhi itholakala (ngokuzenzakalela) ku-/mnt/wlsg/runtime-dir . Le yindlela amawindows angaphansi kokubukeka kwe-wayland, ungabona ukuthi njengoba imihlobiso yewindow ye-wayland ingadonselwa umqambi noma uhlelo lokusebenza, kugcina ukumiswa kwetimu yakho ye-GTK / QT, ngakho-ke ugcina ngewindi lendabuko le-linux elibukeka ngewindi ngaphakathi kwegobolondo leWindows ... okuphazamisa kancane ekuqaleni.

Emulator yesikhumulo

Ku-linux bengikusebenzisa ikati , ngoba ibingenye yama-emulators amasha wokugcina ane-GPU ukushesha[2]kanye nemodi ye-daemon eqinile evumela amawindi amaningi ngesimo esifanayo. Kodwa-ke kumawindi, ngadabula ngama-terminals ambalwa asuselwa ku-windows afana neWindows Terminal, i-fluent terminal, wsltty, conemu, kepha ekugcineni ngishintshele ku wezterm . Yize iyisiginali yakamuva inazo zonke izici ongazifuna kusuka ku-emulator yesiginali:

  • amathebhu nama-panes, ngendlela yokuthi awudingi i-tmux

  • i-multiplexing (imodi ekude engenakhanda), yokuthi awudingi i-tmux

  • imodi yokukopisha umbhalo ene-vi keybindings, yokuthi awudingi i-tmux

  • ukukhetha okusheshayo, imodi yokusikisela ukukhetha izinto zombhalo ngokushesha ukusuka emuva-emuva

  • imiyalo ezenzakalelayo yamathebhu amasha

  • Ukwenza ngokwezifiso okuhle kakhulu kwamamephu wokhiye, ngaphandle kweqiniso lokuthi awukwazi ukusebenzisa i-Left / Right Shift / Ctrl / Alt njengezinguquko ezihlukile.

Nge-Windows ngibuye ngashintsha ukuhamba kwami ​​kokusebenza kancane kangangoba angidingi i-terminal enemodi ye-daemon esekela ama-windows ahlukene amaningi, ngokusebenzisa ukuphela okwehlayo. Ukwenza wezterm Okwehlayo ngemuva kokuzama imibhalo eminingi ye-AHK eyehlayo, ekugcineni ngathola eyodwa lokho kusebenze kahle. Enye indlela engcono kungaba windows-ukuphela-ukuzamazama komhlaba, kepha ngibe nenkinga ngokungaziphathi kahle ngamadeskithophu angokoqobo aphethwe yi-dexpot, kanti i-mitty-quake-console ibonakala ihambisana namadeski we-dexpot. Cishe lapho isipiliyoni se-Windows virtual desktops sithuthuka, ngizoshintshela ku-windows-terminal-quake. I-WezTerm futhi i-cross-platform okusho ukuthi, ngingaqhubeka ngiyisebenzise ngokufakwa kwendabuko kwe-linux. Kube ukutholakala ngenhlanhla ngempela kwalokhu kushintshwa kweWindows + WSL, ngoba uKitty akakasekeli iWindows, nezinye izindlela zokugcina, kube nezicasulo ezinkulu kakhulu Angikwazanga ukwamukela.

[1] I-AutoHotKey
[2] Kungani ngidinga futhi ukusheshiswa kwe-gpu ku-terminal?

Thumela Amathegi: isoftware, amathuluzi
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Lapho ngithola ikhompyutha yami yokuqala eza ne-Windows XP (eneminyaka engu-13y). Ngemuva kokuxakaniseka okumbalwa bekufanele kufundwe ukufaka kabusha amawindi ... Kwakungeyona ipulagi futhi idlale njenganamuhla ... Isipiliyoni sami sokuqala nge-linux sasine-PCLinuxOS okusobala ukuthi usaqhubeka njengoba inikela ngokufakwa okugcwele kokuqhafaza. Ngemuva kwalokho ngiqonde ngqo I-Arch Linux . Ngidlale ne-Arch Linux isikhashana (njengokwenza i-gnome UI ibukeke njengeMacOS noma iWindows Vista ama-gnome bheka ama-mods ). Ngemuva kweminyaka ethile ngabuyela eLinux, okokuqala ngazama I-Alpine , kepha izinqolobane zayo zazingagculisi (okwamanje?) ukuhlolwa repo).

Ngibe sengizama I-Linux engekho isikhashana, kepha bengisebenzisa i- i-musl version ebingenawo amaphakheji amahle wokusekelwa ahlakaniphile, ngakho-ke bengisebenzisa i-void linux plus zokusebenza ezitsheni ku i3wm imvelo esekelwe. Kepha izinhlelo zokusebenza zemidwebo ezihlanganisiwe zazingakasakazeki, izixazululo ezinjenge-flatpak snapd noma i-firejail zazingakasakazeki noma zizinzile, ngakho-ke ngishintshele ku-Ubuntu, ngasetha i-ZFS RAID-Z ( ephila ngendlela eyingozi ) ukufakwa kwezimpande. Njengezindawo zedeskithophu bengisagcina i3wm, bese ngiya ku- zanele bangela i-wayland, bese i-KDE plasma ngoba bengingasakwazi ukuzihlupha ngodoti wamafayela weyunithi ehleliwe okufanele abe umsebenzisi ephethwe ukuthola nje ukusethwa okuncane okulindelwe ukusebenza nganoma yimaphi ama-WM wothayela.

I-KDE yinhle, futhi ngiyithatha njengonqenqemeni oluphuma egazini lwezindawo zedeskithophu, kepha futhi inkulu, futhi inezinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi ezishoda ngokulungiswa okuhle, ngakho-ke iseluleko sami ukuthi ungazami kanzima ukunamathela kumvelo we-K * kuphela we-GUI futhi vele usebenzise okusebenzayo, i-KDE inokusekela okuhle kwesitayela se-GTK. I-KWin inezinketho ezinhle kakhulu zokwenza ngokwezifiso futhi ungabopha ama-hotkey ukuyenza iziphathe kahle kakhulu ku-a ukuntanta kuqala kuthayipha i-WM. Uma ufuna i- kuqala-tile ukuthayipha i-WM lapho kunezandiso ezimbalwa, kepha ezingasebenzi kahle kwi-wayland (ngesikhathi sokubhala).

Muva nje ngibuyele ku-Windows (10) .. futhi , hhayi ngokuyinhloko ngoba imidlalo njengoba kusamele ngithole isikhathi nesisusa sokudlala futhi, kepha ngifisa ukwazi ukuthi a WSL imvelo ye-linux esekwe nokuhlanganiswa okuhle kwezinhlelo zokusebenza zokuqhafaza ( WSLg). Ngesikhathi sokubhala, ngokudabukisayo Windows 10 isipiliyoni ukwehla kwe-de-facto kusuka ku-linux KDE. IWindows ne igundane centric I-UX ibonakala ingenalutho oluqondiswe ekwenzeni ngokwezifiso izinqamuleli zekhibhodi ezijulile. Akucaci ukuthi ngabe Isiko leWindows izinqamuleli zibanjiwe, njengoba kubonakala njengembobo yezokuphepha noma kumane kungumkhawulo onzima wegobolondo lewindows, okuphoqa ukwenziwa ngokwezifiso ngokukhishwa kwerejista. UPowertoys kusenendlela ende okufanele ayenze ukwanelisa zonke izidingo zomuntu ofuna ukulingana indawo yakhe nemikhuba yakhe (angiqiniseki ukuthi ngingabhekwa njengomsebenzisi wamandla ..). Noma kunjalo ngikwazi ukuguquguquka futhi ngezinhlelo ezimbalwa ezivela eceleni imvelo iye yamukeleka ngandlela thile.

Thumela Amathegi: isoftware
Meyi 23, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Yini iziqukathi

[Iziqukathi] igama elinikezwe ezindaweni ezikhawulelwe, elenziwa lakwazi ukuqoqwa kwezinhlelo ezingaphansi kwe-linux njenge [cgroups ] futhi [namespaces ]. Yize ikhasi le-wiki lisebenzisa igama ukwenza kahle Ngicabanga igama ukuzihlukanisa kufaneleke ngokwengeziwe, ngoba i-virtualization isho ukuthi kukhona ungqimba wokuhumusha phakathi, ngenkathi okwenziwa ngamaqoqo kanye nezikhala zamagama ukwehlukanisa, nokwenza izinqubo zibe ngokweziqu.

Amaqembu asetshenziselwa ukuchaza izinqubomgomo zokwabiwa kwezinsizakusebenza, imvamisaRAM futhiCPU , ngenkathi izikhala zamagama zilawula okuqukethwe njengama-mount-points, networking and users. [I-Apparmor] esikhundleni sayo inikeza indlela yokubeka umkhawulo wamakhono wezindawo zeziqukathi zizonke, kanti i-apparmor ngaphandle kweziqukathi, njengoba kubhaliwe ku-wikipedia, kusekelwe ohlelweni.

Amathuluzi afana isicaba futhi umlilosebenzisa iziqukathi, ukuthola indawo yokungena yezinhlelo zokusebenza zomsebenzisi. Iziqukathi ze- [Windows] zisebenzisa amasistimu alinganayo, futhi zinikeza ukusekelwa kweziqukathi ze-linux nge- [WSL].

Kodwa kungani?

  • Kwesinye isikhathi ukuphepha, noma kunjalo kuleso simo, ukubona ngokuphelele okugcwele kunikeza iziqinisekiso ezingcono.

  • Ukufeza ukuzala kabusha kokusebenza, nokuphatheka, okufana nokuthi izinhlelo zokusebenza ezincike ekulungiselelweni kwemvelo ethile zingasebenza ngaphandle kokukhathaza umsebenzisi ngezinyathelo ezengeziwe zokusetha.

  • Ukuhlela, isoftware ye-orchestration efana ne-kubernetes isebenzisa [izikhathi zesikhathi sokuqukatha] ukuhambisa amasevisi kubasingathi ngaphandle komthungo kanye nomqondo wokukhipha ongabonakali.

Kakhulu?

Lapho ngiqala ukwakha uphayini , Ngizame kancane ukuthumela izithombe zami zesitsha, ezisatshalaliswa kusuka ekukhishweni kwe-github. Umbhalo oyinhloko (trees ) imiyalo yayikhona

Usage: trees APP [FLAGS]...
'APP'               Install apps through ostree deltas checkouts.
    -b, --base      base image (alp,trub...)
    -n, --name      same as APP (etcd,hhvm...)
    -f, --force     clear before install
    -d, --delete    clear checkout and prune ostree repo
ck, check           make sure the apps repo is mounted
co, checkout        builds the trees of links for the specified APP
    -t 	            optional path where to build the tree

Yayifana ne-flatpak, njengoba ngangithumela i-ostree static delta ngokususelwa kusithombe esikhulu sikaphayini, futhi [ngibheka] izimpande ezisuselwa kuhlelo lokusebenza olusha, bese ngivula isibonelo sesitsha ngaphezulu kwaso. I-OpenVZ ibinezinkinga eziningi ngaphambi kwe-v7 yokusebenzisa isitsha (ngoba uyazi ... ubusebenzisa i-a isidleke isiqukathi esisekelweni esisekelwe esitsheni [iVPS], futhi i-kernel yayiyimfoloko ye-v2.6 (!)) ... bekuyi- okukhulu uikuchitha iskhathi.

Nini?

Umzamo wami bekuwukuthola isikhathi esincane sokusebenza ngaphandle kokudingadocker noma isoftware engaphezulu ye-beefier, njengoba i-docker kungenzeka ilula kakhulu, futhi isibumbu sedokodo , ukwakhelwa ngaphakathi kwabelana ngokusebenza okuningi futhi kukunikeza izici eziwusizo kakhulu ku-orchestration, okwenza kube kuncike kakhulu kuzidingo zohlelo lokusingathwa uma kuqhathaniswa Ama-k8s noma nomad.

Ngaphandle kokuthi iziqukathi ziyisici ongasifuna kaningi, i-orchestration ayisiyo. Ngiyacabanga okuqondiswe ngokukhululekile imikhankaso yokukhangisa iheha i- engahlosiwe khomba izithameli zaleyo software, okwenza umuntu akholelwe ukuthi ingasiza kubo , ngaphandle kokugcizelela umbono wokuthi wena ngempela ngidinga ukukala okuningi (!) ukufakazela izindleko eziyinkimbinkimbi zokusetha okunjalo. Inombolo ye- lula tooling eyakhelwe ezungeze ama-k8 ukusiza inqubo yokuqalisa iqoqo lama-k8 kufanele kube ubufakazi obenele ...

Iziphetho

Amathuluzi we-Orchestrations agcina eminyanise indawo yezixazululo zokuphatha imishini yokusingathwa eminingi lapho abasebenzisi bengenakukwazi ukubona umehluko phakathi kweziphakeli zezilwane nezinkomo. Ezikhathini eziningi, isoftware efana ne-ansible, pyinfra noma ngisho cssh noma umlotha konke umuntu akudingayo.

Thumela Amathegi: imibono, mayelana
Ephreli 19, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Lokhu kuyimpendulo yamaphoyinti ambalwa ku- Lesi sihloko vula I-Tether (USDT).

  • Umlando we-tether awumusha, kade uphenywa, nokho uyaqhubeka nokusebenza. Kuvunyelwe kanjani ukwenza njalo?

  • Kungashintshaniswa kanjani okusolakala ukuthi kulawulwa wamukele i-tether? Kuphakathi kokuthi konke ukushintshisana okukhulu akulawulwa noma ukukhishwa kwe-tether (okungenani okwakamuva) kufanele ngabe sekuvele kuhlolisisiwe.

  • Kuzungeze ama-5% kuphela asezimpahla ezinani lazo esilaziyo (ukheshi, ama-T-Bill).

    ... ihluke kanjani ibhalansi yesilinganiso sebhange? Ngabe yenziwa ngemali oyaziyo yeqiniso elizobaluleka i-X noma ngabe isakhiwa ama-appraisal, izibikezelo, izinkontileka ezizolungiswa ngokuzayo?

  • Kwaziwa ukuthi iTether iboshelwe ngokwengxenye kwimali engenayo ye-bitfinex (kanye ne- Ithokheni le-LEO)

  • Isikhonkwane sezinhlamvu zemali esizinzile sigcinwa ngokuhweba, njenganoma iyiphi imali "ezinzile" emhlabeni..njengoba kungenakukuvimba ukuthenga nokuthengisa imali nganoma iyiphi intengo oyithandayo ...

  • Uma uthenga i-X ngenhloso yokugcina inani, vele ufuna ukubamba kwakho kuzuze inani, hhayi ukukukhulula !, ngakho ukuphela kwento ongayenza ukutshela abanye ukuthi bathenge ukuvikela ukubamba kwakho. Kulokhu ayilandeli ukuthi i-X uhlelo lwe-ponzi. Lokhu kungamanga, lapho ufinyelela esiphethweni ngaphandle kwazo zonke izakhiwo ezidingekayo. Isitatimende esinengqondo esinembe kakhudlwana sohlelo lwe-ponzi sidinga ukuthi umnikazi azimisele ukulahla isabelo sakhe, lapho nje isabelo sakhe sikhuphuka ngenani..kodwa ngamalini? Futhi lapha sikulokho empeleni ukuthi ukuhweba kubukeka kanjani, uthenga i-X, ulinde ukuthi inqwabelene inani, bese uyathengisa. Eqinisweni ungasho ukuthi yonke imakethe yezezimali uhlelo lwe-ponzi, futhi kulula ukuthola abantu abavumelana nalesi sitatimende. I-Bitcoin ayihlukile kunezinye izinsimbi zezezimali.

  • Abavukuzi bathengisa imivuzo yabo nge-ASAP, ngabe lokhu kuyiqiniso? Ingaqinisekiswa kuketanga, ngokulandela lapho izinkokhelo zamachibi zihamba khona ngemuva kokuhlukaniswa. Ngicabanga ukuthi kunemisebenzi emincane / emaphakathi yezimayini enentshisekelo enkulu ekukhiqizeni i-cryptocurrency engaxoshiwe ku-fiat, futhi ayithengisi i-ASAP, futhi izicubungula yona njengezimayini njengendlela yokugcina inani. Imisebenzi emikhulu ethembele kubanikazi bamasheya abagcwele ibhekana nohlobo oluthile lwezivumelwano, engicabanga ukuthi zikhokhwa kusengaphambili ngezinye izindlela noma zixhaswe kancane. Kulokhu abavukuzi abakhulu bafuna ukukhokha imali yokuqasha. Basebenza kuma-timespans, njenge uma ngingowami nge-X hashrate izinyanga eziyi-X, ngizozuza i-X ngezindleko zamandla zika-Y . Imisebenzi emikhulu yezimayini ayiyona "imfucumfucu yezimakethe", ngakho-ke ukufuna ukuthi intengo ye-BTC kumele isekele abavukuzi bathengise ingcindezi kusho ukuthi kuzoba nokuhlangana okuqinile phakathi kwentengo ye-BTC ne-BTC hashrate ngehora, noma okungenani nsuku zonke. Ngabe kunjalo? I-AFAIK hasharate ibilokhu ihlehlise intengo, futhi ithonywe ezinye izinto.

  • UTether ulwela ukuthola abalingani ngoba kuyaphenywa, futhi akekho noyedwa ofuna inkathazo ngokuzithandela.

  • I-Tether ayisekelwa ngokugcwele, lokhu kuyafana kunoma yiliphi ibhange elinciphisa inani, umehluko ukuthi ukugeleza kwe-tether akunakwenzeka ukuthi kube kubi, okusho ukuthi imali engena ezimakethe ze-crypto, ayivamile ukuphuma kuyo, kanti ukuhamba kwemali kwamabhange kuncike emabhange (noma impilo yabo) uqobo. Izimo ze-runoff mancane kakhulu amathuba okuthi nge-tether.

  • UDeffi wayengekho ku-2017, ukuthuthukiswa nokushicilelwa kochungechunge lwezivumelwano ezihlakaniphile ezakha i-ecosystem kuthatha isikhathi, ikakhulukazi, ukushintshela kwizibambiso eziningi ze-DAI kwenzeka ngo-2019, i-whitepaper eyakhiwe yango-feb 2019.

Anginayo nencazelo yalokho engikushoyo, kodwa kungikhathaza ngempela njengokungaqondakali ukuthi inkululeko yokuthwebula ingakanani enenani lemali entsha engayikhipha, futhi konke ukushintshana okusobala ngokulawulwayo kufanele kukwamukele kahle, uma kunezimbobo eziyisisekelo ku-tether ukuphakela. Isikhala se-crypto sihlukahlukene impela, noma ngabe ukuwa kwe-tether (kungakanani ukuhluleka?) Kunezizwe ezinokugcinwa kwe-BTC. Futhi ukuzimisela ukushiya i-USD njengoba izinga lemali lomhlaba wonke kungokoqobo, iChina yayilungile nge-BTC isongela i-USD, hhayi kahle lapho iqala ukusongela i-CNY. Ngicabanga ukuthi kunamandla ahlukene adlalwayo esikhaleni se-crypto, phakathi kohulumeni, izimboni, amabhange, ukushintshana, amathonya nokuthengisa. Iphini likhomba i-tether njenge impande yabo bonke ububi ishiya umuzwa omubi.

Thumela Amathegi: i-crypto
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Okwamaphupho okuvuselela akusacaci. Zisho izinto ezahlukene kubantu abaningi.

Umbono wami uyisicefe impela; Ngicabanga ukuthi amaphupho enziwa ukukugcina ulele, ngoba udinga ukuphumula. Uma ucabanga ukuthi ubuchopho obungazi ukuthi benzeni, bufuna ukuphaphama, ukukuthula kuthule umuphe okufanele akwenze ... ngakho-ke amaphupho. Uma ukhathele awuphuphi. Lokhu kulandela, njengoba ubuchopho budinga ukuthi benzeni, ngoba isivele ikhathele, ngakho-ke iyazivalela.

Manje kungani amaphupho ethakazelisa? Ngoba bathatha izinkomba ezizungezile, okusho ukuthi noma beqala esakhiweni esijwayelekile, bafika ezimweni ezixakile ngenxa yezinto ezingaphandle (imvamisa kuzwakala).

Zisetshenziselwa "ukwenaba", ngoba ingqondo yethu icubungula ngemuva izinto esizifundayo, njengengxenye yenqubo yokufunda.

Thumela Amathegi: izibani ezikhanyayo
Juni 26, 2021

item.author: untoreh

breadcrumb.text: A few notes on (hashcash derived) proof of work

item.turbo:content:
Ubufakazi bomsebenzi obuqale ngokomlando ngokusetshenziswa kwe-CPU, bese kuba yi-GPU bese kuthi ngokuya ngokusebenza kahle kwe-ASICS kubongwe ukuncipha nokwenza kahle, ngaphandle kwalapho i-algorithm yakhelwe ukuba ibe ngandlela thile ukumelana okusho ukuthi ingazama ukusuthisa okuthile okusebenza njengebhodlela lokuvimbela ukuzuza ekuqhubekekisweni okuqhubekayo.

Eminye imibono ephawuleka yezinkinga nezicelo:

  • Imemori inzima futhi ibophekile : ubunzima bulula kepha i-tech progession ikwenza kube inketho embi yesikhathi eside, kanti ukuboshwa yi-latency kusho ukuthi une ngokomzimba umkhawulo ekuthuthukisweni okungenzeka, kepha kunzima ukuklama futhi kuxhumene nobunzima be-algorithm. [Izikimu zokukhumbula kanzima] njenge-Yescrypt, i-Argon2, iLyra2 zisetshenziselwe ubufakazi bokusebenza, i-dagger-hashimoto ne-ethhash futhi inkumbulo inzima. Azikho izinhlelo zangempela endle zama-algorithm aboshwe ngememori, ngaphandle kobufakazi besitoreji, ngaphandle kokuthi kulokhu, ukubheka yi okubhekiswe kukho hhayi nje impahla esebenzisekayo ye-hashing alghorithm, ngoba ubufakazi kuleli cala bususelwa kuzinqubo eziyinselele / zokuphendula (..njengoba kufanele ukhombise ukuthi ugcina okuthile hhayi ukuthi uzenze nje ukukugcina ..)

  • Umkhawulokudonsa uboshiwe: ukuhambisa idatha ezindaweni zonke kunqunyelwe kumthamo wesiteshi esisetshenzisiwe. Ukufaka i-bandwidth eboshwe nge-algorithm kusho ukusakazwa kwedatha nokusebenzisa isihlungi (esilula!) Phezu kwaso ukuthola amaphethini awusizo, amandla we-algorithm ancike ekuhlulekeni komhlaseli ukubikezela izinkomba lapho idatha efiselekayo ingahle itholakale khona. Ukuphela kokuqalisa engikwaziyo kutholakala ku- iqhwaqhwa lapho a ngokuqhubekayo i-database enkulu eyenziwe nge i-entropy eningi isetshenziswa njengesisekelo. Ububi bokuboshwa komkhawulokudonsa ukuthi bunobungane ku- ukukala , lelo likhono lokufaka kanye nokufaka inqwaba yezingxenyekazi zekhompiyutha ukufeza amakhono ezingeni lezimboni.

  • Ubunzima buboshiwe : le ncazelo ye-wavy yesandla kakhulu ukusho ukuthi kunzima ukwengeza ngokumelene nento evela okungahleliwe ... okungenani ngaphezulu. Uma unomqondo othile okhiqiza umphumela owufunayo, futhi uzama ukwengeza ukucabanga okunjalo, ungakwenza lokho kuphela uma ungabikezela ukusebenza komqondo ngokwesibonelo amanani enqolobane, noma udale amapayipi asheshayo aziwa njenge-recroutines; lokhu kusho ukuthi amandla we-algorithm ancike namandla ayo mbumbulu ukungahleliwe. Njengesibonelo umqondo we izinkontileka ezihlakaniphile ezimayini , noma enye i-algorithm elanda idatha kusuka ku-blockchain. [RandomX] njengoba isetshenziswe ekusetshenzisweni kwe-monero njengembewu i-hash yama- ~ 50 block ngemuva, isandulela se-randomX singatholakala ku i-cryptonight-adaptive noma okungahleliwe. Ukungahleliwe kuyingxenye eyodwa kuphela yokusetshenziswa, enye ukwenza ukusatshalaliswa kwamathuba okufanisa amandla (isb. Imiyalo esethiwe) yomshini oqondisiwe oyifunayo, esimweni se-randomx ukwakhiwa okuvamile kwe-CPU, inkqubela iyi-(nvidia?: P) i-GPU, esimweni sezinkontileka ezihlakaniphile zokuboniswa kwezibalo zezimayini akufunwa ngoba ukwenziwa kwenqubo eyisisekelo kuconsisa insiza.

  • Ukubulawa kuboshiwe : noma isikhathi ukuboshwa, ngokuvamile kusho ukuthi kudinga imininingwane ethile ukukhiqiza imininingwane ethile, ngokulandelana kwayo (njengokuphinda into efanayo izikhathi eziningi) okudala yazo zonke izinto i-crypto futhi isetshenziswa kakhulu (konke?) Ama-cipher ngoba kuyindlela eqonde kakhulu (futhi esobala) yokuhweba ukubalwa kwe-obfuscation. Lapho usebenzisa lo mqondo ezingeni eliphansi (ukudala umsebenzi we-hashing ongenakulinganiswa), i-algorithm kufanele ibe lula ngangokunokwenzeka, njenge mfushane ukusebenza kwezibalo, njengokuthi kungenzeka ukuhlukanisa umsebenzi ngokusebenzisa izinqubo ezifanayo kuyancishiswa. Ama- [VDF] azuza lokhu, noma, ngaphandle kwezidingo zokusetha, izinhlelo ezinje isinqumookusho ukuthi "okushesha kakhulu kunqoba njalo", yingakho i-VDF ingathathwa njenge-POW kuphela uma ukwenziwa kwaziwa (kufakazelwa?) ukuthi kunganciphisi ngaphezu kokulibaziseka kokuxhumana kwe-Δ (delta) kohlelo okuhlose yisebenzise (isib. inethiwekhi ye-p2p). Noma iyiphi i-algorithm ebhekise ukubopha ukwenziwa ngaphandle kwe-trapdoor isho ukubalwa okungu-1: 1 phakathi kwe-prover ne-verifier, kepha akuyona i-deterministic, okuyisidingo (ngiyavuma ukusho ..) se-POW. [I-Unprll] kwakuyimali esetshenziswa ngokulandelana, ukuqinisekiswa kwe-hashes kwakuyingxenye (1/8?), Ukuthuthukisa isilinganiso sokuqinisekisa / se-prover ngenhla kwe-1. Olunye uhlamvu lwemali olubonakala lusebenzisa i-hashing elandelanayo pascalcoin ngokuxuba kobunzima bememori.

Thumela Amathegi: i-crypto
Julayi 25, 2021

item.author: untoreh
item.turbo:content:
Ukukhetha ini OS run kumaseva akho kuyindaba elula nokujwayela. Ukuba lula kusho ukuthi ufuna okuthile okukunikeza izinkinga ezimbalwa ngangokunokwenzeka, ukujwayela kusho ukuthi ungathanda hhayi ukufunda izinto ezingeziwe uma ungadingi.

Amaseva ami izilwane ezifuywayongakho-ke kulungile ngikhipha imiyalo embalwa njalo ngesikhashana, futhi angidingi ukuzenzakalela okuphelele.

Ngemuva kokuzama ICoreOS isikhathi esingangonyaka ngishintshela kweyami eyenziwe lula distro ngokususelwa ku-alpine futhi u-ostree.

Imigomo

Le nguqulo ye-alpine ithatha izinkomba kusuka ku- I-flatcar futhi iphrojekthi-athomu futhi kulindeleke ukuthi ifakwe njengohlelo lokufunda kuphela lwempande enezibuyekezo ezenzeka nge-athomu, okungukuthi, ziyaphumelela noma uhlelo lubuyela esimweni esedlule. Ukuze lokhu kwenzeke ohlelweni kufanele okungenani kube nakho okungenani izifinyezo ezimbili yohlobo lwefayela lohlelo olukhishiwe, olutholakala ekugcineni.

Okuqondiwe

Kuzosebenza kuziphi izindawo uhlelo? Ngikhombe I-OVZ ne- [KVM], kepha ngokujwayelekile ungasho iziqukathi futhi imishini ebonakalayo ngomehluko omkhulu ukuthi iziqukathi azisebenzi i-kernel yazo, ikakhulukazi ayinayo inqubo yokuqalisa, zibiza ngqo ku init system (okuyisibonelo kuDockerfile kungachazwa yiCMD nomaENTRYPOINT izitatimende), esibhekele ukuphatha isihlahla semithamo esizogcina isitsha sisebenza (njengeseshini ejwayelekile, uma inqubo ye-init ifa, isitsha siyaphela). Futhi iziqukathi azikwazi ukumisa izinkinobho zohlelo, futhi zingaba nemikhawulo eyengeziwe emandleni.

Ukuqaphela inqubo yokwakha

Isithombe sakhiwa kanjani?

Ukuncika

I-prepare.sh iskripthi sisingatha ukuncika, iningi lakhona okungamaphakeji okunikela ngamathuluzi ajwayelekile we-ehl afana ne-coreutils, util-linux, binutils , Izinsiza ezisebenza ngamadivayisi we-block njengeblkid, sfdisk, multipath-tools nezinhlelo zamafayela ngexfsprogs futhie2fsprogs . I-squashfs-tools package isetshenziswa ekugcineni ukucindezela uhlelo lwefayela lempande elakhiwe. Aglib iphakethe lokuhambisana nalo lifakwe ngokuzenzakalela ngoba i-alpine isuselwe ku-musl, iphakethe lokuhambisana lisebenza ngokunikela ngemitapo yolwazi ethile eyakhelwe ngokumelene nayo.

Isihlahla

Izihlahla zefayela zawo womabili ama-VM neziqukathi zakhiwa ngokulandelanamake.sh futhimake_ovz.sh . Le incazelo elula yezinyathelo

  • setha inguqulo ukuthi yakhiwe ngokuya ngomaki wokugcina

  • dala umkhombandlela wesihlahla esisha bese usula imvelo

  • dala izinkomba eziqondisiwe eziyisisekelo nezikhombisi-ndlela ezidingeka nge-ostree, njengesysroot

  • dala ama-symlinks ukuze ahambisane ne- izinga lesistimu yefayela ejwayelekile

  • kopisha amasevisi wangokwezifiso nama-configs wangokwezifiso

  • isetro chroot enezinkomba eziqondisiwe zesistimu

  • i-bootstrap izimpande ze-alpine ezinamaphakeji wesisekelo

  • sebenzisa ukumiswa okuncane kuzimpande ezinjengeziqinisekiso, indawo yesikhathi, igama lomethuleli.

  • services izoqalwa yi-init

  • setha ukumiswa kwe-boot ngomfanekiso we-kernel ocacisiwe

  • engeza ngokuzithandela amamojula we-kernel yangokwezifiso

  • yenza ukuhlanza

  • nikela izimpande[1] endaweni yokugcina izinto ezisencane

Kwiziqukathi, ukulandelana kuyafana, kepha izinguquko zokumiswa, ngoba ngohlelo olungaboshiwe ku-a ukulanda I-ostree inezinkinga zokuqinisekisa imvelo, kufanele sisebenzise ezinye ukusebenza futhi usethe amanye amadivayisi avame ukuphathwa yifayela le- initramfs isinyathelo. Ngale ndlela I-OVZ noma I-LXC izifanekiso zilungiselelwe.

Ukupakisha

Lapho sesinesihlahla sethu samafayela esizinikele nge-ostreebuild.sh nomabuild-update.sh unakekela ukukhiqiza i-artifact ezosatshalaliswa. Umehluko phakathi kwemibhalo ukuthi inguqulo yokuvuselela iqala endaweni yokugcina yangaphambilini ye-ostree, futhi futhi ikhiqiza i-delta artifact lapho uhlelo olusebenzayo lungasebenza esimweni sayo se-ostree ukwenza ukuthuthuka. Le yincazelo eyenziwe lula yezinyathelo zokwakha

  • uma okusha build

    • dala izingxenye ezintsha kusithombe esisha esifakwe njengedivayisi ye-loop

  • okunye

    • ukukhweza okwe-sysroot ne-boot kokwakhiwa kwangaphambilini

  • hlanza ukusetshenziswa kwangaphambilini kwama-ostree (amapulazi wokuxhumanisa) esakhiweni esakhiwe

  • yenza umuthi omusha owakhiwe ekwakhiweni okwakhiwe

  • qinisekisa ubuqotho kanye namasheke

  • dala i-delta entsha yokuthuthuka

  • yenza ukuthunyelwa kwe-ostree ukuvuselela ukucushwa kwe-boot

  • susa izithembiso zakudala

  • qinisekisa ubuqotho bokuhlukanisa i-boot

  • yehlisa isithombe esakhiwe esisha

  • khiqiza i-checksum yesithombe bese usicindezela (ngesquashfs iziqukathi)

Ukucushwa kokuhlukaniswa kusetshenziswa nge-fdisklayout.cfg ifayela elichaza osayizi bokuhlukanisa, sinesahlukaniso esisodwa sezimpande (~430M ), ukwahlukaniswa kwebhuthi (~40M ) kanye nokwahlukanisa okushintshanayo (~40M ). Ngeziqukathi ezinokweqa nje ukufaka okwedlule ngokwedivayisi ye-loop, bese umane udonse ukuzibophezela okusha kwe-ostree ngaphezulu kwendawo endala (ekhishiwe) ye-ostree.

Ukwenza ngezifiso

Yini engiyihlanganisa kulesi sithombe (ngaphandle kwamaphakeji afakiwe)?

  • I-lib encane ngaphakathifunctions.sh yemisebenzi ejwayelekile eyenziwe ngaphakathi kweShell

  • imibhalo yokuvuselela esekwe ku-ostree enendlela yokukhiya esuselwa esitolo se-KV

  • ukuqapha imibhalo ye-IO yomibili yendawo (iomon ) kanye nenethiwekhi (tcpmon)

  • imibhalo yokusetha yezikhathi zokusebenza zesitsha ngaphandle kwe-bubblewrap: podman, toolbox

Lokho okwake kwaba khona futhi akusekho

  • sup: Sup yayisetshenziselwa i-orchestration (deploy container) nokumiswa komshini wokusingathwa, kepha ngabe sengishintshela ku ukuphendula ngoba bekukhona izimbungulu ezinde ezinde ku-sup ebezingalungiswa, angikhethanga ukuphendula kusukela ekuqaleni ngoba bengingafuni ukuncika kwe-python ukufaka kuwo wonke amaseva, ekugcineni ngazinza ne-alpine yesibili impumu kumishini yokubamba, etholakala ku-/opt/alpngabe ngifaka isoftware engabaluleki kangako. Namuhla, noma kunjalo, bengizophinda ngishintshe ukusuka kokungahambelani kuye phinfra , ngoba

    • iyi-python ngaphandle kwe-boilerplate (ansible has pseudoDSL lokho kubangela ukuphathwa yikhanda okuningi kunalokho okuxazululayo)

    • yenza izindlela zayo ngemiyalo ecacile ye-ssh, ngakho-ke ayikho imfuneko yokuthembela ku-python kuma-target host

  • containerpilot : Icala lokusebenzisa lomshayeli wesitsha ukuphatha ukuxhomekeka okuyinkimbinkimbi phakathi kweziqukathi ngaphandle kwemibhalo yeShell ... iyeke ukuthola izibuyekezo ezivela kuzo thabile futhi yabekwa kwimodi yesondlo, angithandanga nezidingo zememori nokusetshenziswa kwememori kungenzeka kukhule njalo isikhathi eside sesikhathi sokuphumula. Ngiyishintshele imibhalo elula yeShell nge inxusa , Ngingahle ngibheke ezinye izindlela ezifanele uma imibhalo yeShell iqala ukukhula kakhulu. Izixazululo ezisindayo njenge kubernetes, isibumbu noma nomad balahlwa kusukela ekuhambeni.

  • beegfs Ngangithumela imodyuli yekernel edingekayo izinyosi kepha ngemuva kwesikhashana kwephule ukuhambisana, kanye neqiniso lokuthi bekungasekelwa kahle fuse module eyenziwe ukuyilahla ngokuphelele, njengamanje angisebenzisi i- [DFS] kumaseva wami, kepha kungenzeka ukuthi ngilungele ukuhamba nohlelo lwefayela lokufaka inethiwekhi kusakhanga.

Ukufaka

Ukufaka isithombe ungasilayisha kumhlinzeki wokusingathwa bese usifaka kusuka ku-VNC, uma kwenzeka kuba nemishini ebonakalayo, kepha ngivame ukuduna ukufakwa okukhona, ngoba kuhlala kunokwenzeka, inqobo nje uma ngivivinye iskripthi sokusetha ngohlobo lwe ukusatshalaliswa kwe-linux, imvamisa ngisebenzisa i-debian-8 noma i-ubuntu-14, angizange ngivivinye ezinye ngoba lokhu ngihlale ngithola ukuthi lokhu kuyatholakala. Izinyathelo zokusetha ziyalandela

  • qinisekisa ukusekelwa kwe-https kokulandiwe

  • landa inguqulo ye-busybox

  • faka i-busybox link-farm

  • nquma amakheli we-ipv4 / ipv6 wokumiswa kwenethiwekhi

  • qinisekisa amakhono we-chroot

  • landa isithombe sikaphayini bese usikhipha

  • uma i-VM

    • ukukhanya phezu kwelitshe ledivayisi

    • khwela phezu kwensimbi yeluphu

  • bhala ukumiswa kwenethiwekhi yendawo ngaphezulu kwe- ukuze kukhanye izimpande

  • uma isitsha

    • kopisha insizakalo ye-init (yeziqukathi) ngaphezulu kwephuzu eliyinhloko lezimpande/sbin/init

  • uma i-VM

    • ukwahlukanisa idiski engakwesokunxele ngokujwayelekile (xfs ) ukwahlukanisa

    • yehlisa

    • qinisekisa ubuqotho bokuhlukaniswa

  • qala kabusha

Iziphetho

ngenze uphayini 5 years from time of writing and I am still using it, and I see no reasons to switch to anything else. Alpine as a linux distro is great, simple, and I have never experienced breakage. I can easily deploy on OKUDLALIWE amaseva ajwayele ukunikela ngezinsizakusebenza eziphansi kakhulu, empeleni nginebhokisi elisebenza nge-just64M ye-RAM, futhi ngisenazo zonke izici engizidingayo.

[1] uhlelo lwefayela lempande

Thumela Amathegi: amathuluzi, mayelana
Ephreli 19, 2021
